highlights:

  • Trained in the art of Full Stack Web Development, I only use my powers for good.
  • I consider myself a fully stacked Front-End developer. I have a deep passion for design, user experience and interface. You could say that, full-frontal development is kind of my thing.
  • I constantly strive to add new tools of the trade to my utility belt.
  • Life motto: Meet them where they are and lead them to where they are going.

fun facts:

  • I live in Seattle with my wife and dog. Although, I often share my time in Portland, OR.
  • I'm not a fan of social-media but I do love me some Instagrams
  • Whisk(e)y and coffee are my poisons.
  • How do I feel about DJ-ing cats? Yeah, I'm into 'em.
